subject: Order #SSN3862
description_text:
Hello,
I ordered the Simsonn Plus X racing pedals and haptic sensors on November 25th and I see that only the haptic sensors are being delivered. Can you confirm that the pedals are also on their way to me within the 5-7 business day shipping time?
Thank you,
David

conversations.body_text: Hello, any updates on this? David
Hi david whiting,     Hello, I see that your order has been delivered. Below is the tracking information for your reference.

Thank you, I just received it! However, I ordered the version with the black baseplate but that was not included. Can you please send the baseplate as per my original order? For reference, I ordered the Plus X P2-H2 with Baseplate in black. Thank you, David Whiting
Here’s a photo of the pedals and haptic units installed on the pedals but no baseplate. Thank you, David Whiting
Hi david whiting,  We apologize for the delay caused by the current stock shortage of the base plate at our U.S. warehouse. We expect to ship your order once the item arrives next Thursday.
That’s unfortunate but I understand, thank you. David Whiting
Hello, can I please have updated shipping information on the pedal plate please? Thank you, David
Hi david whiting,     There has been a delay in the delivery of the parcel.   We will ship your order immediately upon receiving the item today.
